title: Ending Needless Suffering in Francophone Africa (HRW - Human Rights Watch)
text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) As people live longer, healthcare systems face an important challenge: caring for more and more people who suffer from pain, shortness of breath, nausea, anxiety, and depression because of advanced chronic
